Introducing Tracks:

"Decepticons, don't let those Autobots scape!" Was the classical 
order Megatron had once more used for his soldiers. He lured Autobots 
to space, where he wanted to take them down and conquer his enemy 
once and for all. It was somewhat an unfair battle for the Autobots 
had little space ships to use.

The blue corvette named Tracks agreed to go to the mission as back-up 
support for his other wingmates Skyfire and Powerglide were already 
busy with the Decepticon jets. He wanted to go by himself, but 
Optimus persuaded him to use one of the few ships.

That happened what seemed a billion mega-cycles ago, and now here he 
was, trapped in the middle of a seemingly endless battle, hoping for 
his fragile battle ship not to be shoot down any time soon. But 
Skywarp was pursuing him like a cat to a mouse.
Skywarp's null-ray beams struck Tracks' ship right in the center of 
its energy core, sending Tracks flying aimlessly into space. The 
ship's core sparkled and an explosion ocurred, Tracks braced himself 
for his death. However, he founf himself in what seemed like a 
vortex, the pressure and speed increassing at any second until his 
CPU shut him down to protect him.

=

Tracks' ship crashed on the earth, buring half of it under mud and 
rocks. The blue corvette came online after some minutes. "What 
happened?" He rubbed the back of his head and raised his optics to 
watch past the shattered crystal. "Great, now this ship is slag... 
just like myself" he thought as he tried to get out from it. Only to 
find out he hadn't crashed in the moon and that he no longer was in 
what he used to call 'Earth'. It was all a jungle, a primitive jungle 
no the less.
"Great!" He whinned. "Where the slag I am...?"
